talents.option1: +1000 True Form and Spirit Bear Health

abilities.desc: Summons a powerful Spirit Bear companion that can equip items.  If the bear moves 1100 distance away from the Lone Druid, it cannot attack.  Lone Druid suffers 20.0% of his max health as backlash damage if the Spirit Bear dies. Spirit Bear does not benefit from attributes.Spirit Bear has the Return, Demolish and Entangling Claws abilities.
abilities.name: Summon Spirit Bear
abilities.notes: Most spells interact with the Spirit Bear in the same way as they do with heroes.

abilities.desc: Links Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear, sharing a percentage of their armor with each other, increasing the attack speed of both and causing damage dealt by the Spirit Bear to heal Lone Druid.
abilities.name: Spirit Link

abilities.desc: Lone Druid and the Spirit Bear roar fiercely causing nearby enemies to flee towards their base in terror. Their movement speed is increased by 20%.
abilities.name: Savage Roar
abilities.notes: Cooldown is shared with Spirit Bear.

abilities.desc: Lone Druid learns to morph himself into a raging bear, losing his ranged advantage, but gaining increased bonus armor and health, and improved versions of Entangling Claws and Demolish.
abilities.name: True Form
abilities.notes: Cooldowns of items that are different for ranged and melee units will be based on which form Lone Druid was in when the item was used.
